virtual ~SimpleAppContext ()

Detailed Description

SimpleAppContext goes hand in hand with SimpleScheduler. It does not keep context information, as all Applications share the same stack.

Member Function Documentation

void SimpleAppContext::MsgLoop (   )  [virtual]
 

Wakes up on Messages and sends them to the attached Application.

Implements AbstractAppContext.

void SimpleAppContext::SendMsg (  Message &  msg  )  [virtual]
 

Wakes up and sends a message to the attached Application. Incoming Messages will continue to trigger Applications.

Parameters:
msg a reference to the Message to be sent

Implements AbstractAppContext.

void SimpleAppContext::StartUp (   )  [virtual]
 

Sets up the SimpleAppContext for the attached Application and enters MsgLoop.

Reimplemented from AbstractAppContext.

void SimpleAppContext::Wait (  const Condition &  cond  )  [virtual]
 

Stops program flow and waits for the Condition to become true.

Implements AbstractAppContext.
